name: Todo
description:
Simple todo list plugin to check off your tasks inside Figma!


Features

  • Add, check off or delete tasks
  • Updates instantly when other users make changes
  • Copy a list (or some stickies) and paste into the plugin to create multiple tasks
  • Easily minimize the window to focus on your work


Wishlist

  • Multiple lists
  • Sub tasks
  • Custom window / list title
